trans-unit.source: Indicates that a rule is updating a variable, in order to cause reevaluation of affected rules.
trans-unit.target: 指示规则正在更新变量，以便重新计算受影响的规则。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to indicate to the rules engine that execution of this rule's set of actions causes a change to the field or property that is specified (or all fields and properties on an object), so that any rules that are dependent on this field or property can be reevaluated.
trans-unit.target: 此类用于向规则引擎指示执行此规则的操作集可导致指定的字段或属性（或一个对象的所有字段和属性）发生更改，从而可以重新计算依赖于此字段或属性的任何规则。

trans-unit.source: An `Update` call does not prevent other actions in the action block from executing.
trans-unit.target: `Update` 调用不会阻止操作块中其他操作的执行。

trans-unit.source: The set of fields/properties that are modified (specified through `Update` or by using <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleWriteAttribute>s on methods invoked) is used to determine chaining when the set of actions for this particular rule finishes executing.
trans-unit.target: 修改的字段/属性集（通过 `Update` 指定或通过对调用的方法使用 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleWriteAttribute> 来指定）用于确定此特定规则的操作集完成执行时的链接。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the name of the field or property changed.
trans-unit.target: 表示更改的字段或属性的名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The character "/" is used as a separator.
trans-unit.target: “/”字符用作分隔符。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: To indicate that the property `this.SomeProperty` was modified, the `path` parameter would be `this/SomeProperty`.
trans-unit.target: 若要指示属性 `this.SomeProperty` 已修改，`path` 参数应为 `this/SomeProperty`。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the value changed as specifically as you prefer (for example, if you only modified `this.SomeProperty/SomeOtherProperty`, you can specify `this/SomeProperty/SomeOtherProperty`).
trans-unit.target: 可以根据需要明确地指定更改的值（例如，如果只修改 `this.SomeProperty/SomeOtherProperty`，则可以指定 `this/SomeProperty/SomeOtherProperty`）。

trans-unit.source: In the latter case, other rules that used `this.SomeProperty/AnyOtherProperty` would not be reevaluated.
trans-unit.target: 在后一种情况下，不会重新计算使用 `this.SomeProperty/AnyOtherProperty` 的其他规则。

trans-unit.source: To specify that all fields and properties are modified, append "*" to the end of the path.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定修改所有字段和属性，请在路径末尾追加“*”。

trans-unit.source: For example, `this/SomeProperty/*` indicates that all fields and properties on `this.SomeProperty` were modified.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`this/SomeProperty/*` 指示修改 `this.SomeProperty` 上的所有字段和属性。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, all rules that use any field or property on `this.SomeProperty` would be reevaluated.
trans-unit.target: 因此，会重新计算使用 `this.SomeProperty` 上的任何字段或属性的所有规则。

trans-unit.source: If the rule set is run with <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet.ChainingBehavior%2A> set to <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleChainingBehavior.None>, this action is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果在将 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet.ChainingBehavior%2A> 设置为 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleChainingBehavior.None> 的情况下运行该规则集，则会忽略此操作。

trans-unit.source: Creates a deep copy of the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建当前 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> 的深层副本。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> that is identical to this instance.
trans-unit.target: 与此实例完全相同的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前的 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 进行比较的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two object instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: 确定两个对象实例是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the objects are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果对象相等，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution" /> context used to execute the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" />.
trans-unit.target: 用于执行 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> 上下文。

trans-unit.source: Executes the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> using the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> 执行 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回此实例的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: The hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 此实例的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> to manage the validation process.
trans-unit.target: 要管理验证过程的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the fields and properties updated by a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回由 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> 更新的字段和属性。

trans-unit.source: A list of the fields and properties changed by a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> 更改的字段和属性的列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction" /> 的路径。

trans-unit.source: The path of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction" /> 的路径。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction.Path%2A> is a string that represents the name of the field or property that is changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction.Path%2A> 是一个字符串，它表示更改的字段或属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: "/" is used as a separator.
trans-unit.target: “/”用作分隔符。

trans-unit.source: To indicate that the property `this.SomeProperty` has been modified, the property would be "`this/SomeProperty`".
trans-unit.target: 若要指示属性 `this.SomeProperty` 已修改，该属性应为“`this/SomeProperty`”。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the changed value as specifically as you prefer (for example, if you only modified `this.SomeProperty/SomeOtherProperty`, you can specify "`this/SomeProperty/SomeOtherProperty`").
trans-unit.target: 可以根据需要明确地指定更改的值（例如，如果只修改 `this.SomeProperty/SomeOtherProperty`，则可以指定“`this/SomeProperty/SomeOtherProperty`”）。

trans-unit.source: In the latter case, other rules that used `this.SomeProperty/AnyOtherProperty` would not be reevaluated.
trans-unit.target: 在后一种情况下，不会重新计算使用 `this.SomeProperty/AnyOtherProperty` 的其他规则。

trans-unit.source: To specify that all fields and properties are modified, append "*" to the end of the path.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定修改所有字段和属性，请在路径末尾追加“*”。

trans-unit.source: For example, "`this/SomeProperty/*`" indicates that all fields and properties on `this.SomeProperty` have been modified.
trans-unit.target: 例如，“`this/SomeProperty/*`”指示修改 `this.SomeProperty` 上的所有字段和属性。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, all rules that use any field or property on `this.SomeProperty` would be reevaluated.
trans-unit.target: 因此，会重新计算使用 `this.SomeProperty` 上的任何字段或属性的所有规则。

trans-unit.source: If the rule set is run with <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet.ChainingBehavior%2A> set to <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleChainingBehavior.None>, this action is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果在将 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet.ChainingBehavior%2A> 设置为 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleChainingBehavior.None> 的情况下运行该规则集，则会忽略此操作。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that indicates the field or property that the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> is updating.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个字符串，指示 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.Rule" /> 正在更新的字段或属性。

trans-unit.source: The string "Update <<see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction.Path" />>".
trans-unit.target: 字符串“Update <<see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleUpdateAction.Path" />>”。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> to manage the validation process.
trans-unit.target: 要管理验证过程的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" />。

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> is configured correctly and has no errors.
trans-unit.target: 验证 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> 是否已正确配置且没有错误。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> has no errors; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> 没有错误，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。
